sentences.english: The master copy can not exceed 50 pages.
sentences.chinese: 每一科目讲义原稿一次送印请勿超过50页。

sentences.english: To check out more photos snapped with the E-PM1, download the untouched originals here.
sentences.chinese: 对于原图有兴趣的朋友可于此处下载原稿。

sentences.english: This is the script of the play of"Romio and Juliet".
sentences.chinese: 这是剧本“罗密欧和朱丽叶”的原稿。

sentences.english: I cancelled many unnecessary words in my manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 我把我原稿许多不需要的字删去了。

sentences.english: The new editor picked her manuscript to pieces.
sentences.chinese: 新编辑把她的原稿批得一无是处。

sentences.english: We're trying to restore information and digitalize manuscripts.
sentences.chinese: 我们正设法重建资料，将原稿数位化。

sentences.english: She collated the final proof with the original manuscript.
I hunted down the manuscript in the British Museum.
sentences.chinese: 我在不列颠博物馆里找来找去终于找到了那份原稿。

sentences.english: MANUSCRIPT】He sent the manuscript to the printer yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天将原稿送到印刷厂。

sentences.english: Thou shouldst print more, not let that copy die.
sentences.chinese: 你多印几份，并非要毁掉原稿。

sentences.english: the subtle subscriber found the prescription manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 敏感的认购者找处处方原稿。

sentences.english: Wigley was in charge of CRU when the original paper was published.
sentences.chinese: 论文原稿发表时威格力担任CRU的管理人。

sentences.english: Manuscripts should respect the Guidelines for contributors and mention this call for papers in a covering letter.
sentences.chinese: 原稿需尊重投稿指南并在附函上提及本征稿启事。

sentences.english: The manuscript was interlined with his corrections.
sentences.chinese: 那原稿行间夹有他修改的词语。

definition: rough sketch (of a painting)/(of an official) to approve a document by signing it
to go to press/to submit for printing
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
